meanings.sent1: The unflattering dress made her look bigger than she was.
meanings.sent2: The unflattering photo captured her at a bad angle.
meanings.sent3: The unflattering haircut made her resemble a mushroom.
meanings.sent4: The unflattering lighting cast shadows on her face.
meanings.sent5: The unflattering outfit drew attention to her least favorite features.

meanings.definition: Not showing someone or something in a good light.
meanings.sent1: The unflattering review criticized the restaurant's service.
meanings.sent2: The unflattering portrayal of the character disappointed the fans.
meanings.sent3: The unflattering comparison to a clown made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unflattering truth about the situation finally came to light.
meanings.sent5: The unflattering description painted a bleak picture of the town.
